document_api_meta.title: Search Goods Info
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API is used to retrieve a list of goods belonging to the merchant that meet the specified conditions. It returns detailed information about the goods, including their IDs, names, and other attributes, such as the goods-SKU relationship, dimensions, and weight as verified by the warehouse.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc:
The number of results to be returned per page. 
Valid range: [1-100].

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: goods_ids
request_body_param.desc:
Identifier for goods generated by Fulfilled by TikTok system, maximum length 100. Filter the goods information to display only those with specific goods IDs.
Note: When `goods_ids`, `reference_codes`, `sku_ids`, or `product_ids` include two or more values, the result will return the intersection of the goods information. For example, if the input includes both `goods_ids` and `sku_ids`, it will return only the goods that meet both the `goods_ids` and `sku_ids` criteria. If requested with all criteria empty, it will return a `page_size` number of goods defined by the merchant, sorted by creation time, with the latest first.

request_body_param.name: product_ids
request_body_param.desc: Identifier for product generated by TikTok Shop system, maximum length 100. Filter the goods information to display only those with specific product IDs.

request_body_param.name: reference_codes
request_body_param.desc: Identifier for goods defined by merchant, maximum length 100. Filter the goods information to display only those with specific reference codes.

request_body_param.name: sku_ids
request_body_param.desc: Identifier for Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) generated by TikTok Shop system, maximum length 100. Filter the goods information to display only those with specific SKU IDs.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Provide this value in the page_token parameter of your request if the current response does not return all the results.

response_param.name: ^total_count
response_param.desc: The total number of goods that meet the query conditions.

response_param.name: ^goods
response_param.desc: A list of detailed information for Fulfilled by TikTok goods.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The identifier for goods generated by Fulfilled by TikTok system.

response_param.name: ^^name
response_param.desc: The goods name.

response_param.name: ^^barcodes
response_param.desc: A list of detailed information for goods barcodes.

response_param.name: ^^^code
response_param.desc: The printable barcode for the goods.

response_param.name: ^^^type
response_param.desc:
The barcode type.
Possible values: 
- UPC 
- EAN 
- GTIN
- ASIN OR FNSKU 
- MERCHANT SKU ID 
- FBT SPECIFIC BARCODE

response_param.name: ^^reference_code
response_param.desc: The identifier for goods defined by merchant.

response_param.name: ^^image_url
response_param.desc: The goods image url.

response_param.name: ^^merchant_declaration_info
response_param.desc: The dimension and weight info input by merchant.

response_param.name: ^^^weight
response_param.desc: The goods weight.

response_param.name: ^^^^value
response_param.desc: Weight value, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^unit
response_param.desc:
Weight unit.
Possible values:
- MILLIGRAM 
- GRAM
- KILOGRAM 
- POUND 
- OUNCE

response_param.name: ^^^dimension
response_param.desc: The goods dimension.

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc: Width value, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^length
response_param.desc: Length value, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^height
response_param.desc: Height value, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^unit
response_param.desc:
Dimension unit. 
Possible values:
- MILLIMETER 
- CENTIMETER
- METER 
- FOOT 
- INCH
- MICROMETER

response_param.name: ^^warehouse_confirmation_info
response_param.desc: The dimension and weight information verified by warehouse when first inbound.

response_param.name: ^^^weight
response_param.desc: The goods weight.

response_param.name: ^^^^value
response_param.desc: Weight value verified by warehouse, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^unit
response_param.desc:
Weight unit.
Possible values:
- MILLIGRAM 
- GRAM
- KILOGRAM 
- POUND 
- OUNCE

response_param.name: ^^^dimension
response_param.desc: The goods dimension.

response_param.name: ^^^^width
response_param.desc: Width value verified by warehouse, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^length
response_param.desc: Length value verified by warehouse, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^height
response_param.desc: Height value verified by warehouse, up to three decimal places.

response_param.name: ^^^^unit
response_param.desc:
Dimension unit. 
Possible values:
- MILLIMETER 
- CENTIMETER
- METER 
- FOOT 
- INCH
- MICRO

response_param.name: ^^skus
response_param.desc: A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) infomation matched with current FBT goods.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The identifier for SKU generated by TikTok Shop system.

response_param.name: ^^^name
response_param.desc: The SKU name.

response_param.name: ^^^image_url
response_param.desc: The TikTok Shop SKU image url.

response_param.name: ^^^product
response_param.desc: The TikTok Shop product matched with current Fulfilled by TikTok goods.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: The identifier for product generated by TikTok Shop system.

response_param.name: ^^^^name
response_param.desc: The TikTok Shop product name.

response_param.name: ^^^^image_url
response_param.desc: The Tiktok Shop product image url.

response_param.name: ^^^regions
response_param.desc: The regions where the SKU is being sold, represented by region codes in the two-character ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

response_param.name: ^^^matched
response_param.desc:
A flag indicating whether the Fulfilled by TikTok goods is matched with the TikTok Shop SKU.
True: Matched.
False: Not matched.

response_param.name: ^^lot_expiration_info
response_param.desc: The goods lot control and expiration managment information.

response_param.name: ^^^is_lot_control
response_param.desc:
A flag indicating whether the goods is under lot control. 
True: Under lot control.
False: Not under lot control.
Note: Lot code and expiration date management information is mandatory for these [product categories](https://bytedance.us.larkoffice.com/sheets/OoT2sKH7jhykXCtHEseuzkGYsod) according to Fulfilled by TikTok guidelines.

response_param.name: ^^^is_expiration_management
response_param.desc:
A flag indicating whether the goods is under expiration managment. 
True: Under expiration managment.
False: Not under expiration managment.

response_param.name: ^^^shelf_life_days
response_param.desc: The goods shelf life days input by merchant, represent the total number of days the product remains usable or sellable from the time it is manufactured until its expiration.

response_param.name: ^^^inbound_cutoff_days
response_param.desc: The goods inbound cutoff days before expiration, represent the time period before the product's expiration when the warehouse will no longer accept inbound shipments.

response_param.name: ^^^expiration_alert_days
response_param.desc: The goods alert days before expired, represent the period of time before platform send expiration reminder alerts to the merchant.

response_param.name: ^^^sales_cutoff_days
response_param.desc: The goods sales cut off days before expired, represent the period of time before expiration in which the goods will no longer be available for sale.

response_param.name: ^^^handling_method
response_param.desc:
The handling method for expired inventory. 
Possible values:
- TURN_INTO_DEFECTIVE_INVENTORY 
- RETURN_TO_SUPPLIER 
- DISPOSE

response_param.name: ^^^return_cycle
response_param.desc:
The return cycle applied when the handling method is set to RETURN_TO_SUPPLIER. In this case, the automatic creation of exit inventory orders will follow one of return cycle rules.
Possible values:
- ONCE_A_WEEK
- ONCE_A_MONTH
- ONCE_A_QUARTER

response_param.name: ^^^addresses
response_param.desc: The goods return address for return to supplier handling method.

response_param.name: ^^^^name
response_param.desc: The name of the contact person.

response_param.name: ^^^^phone_number
response_param.desc: The phone number of the contact person.

response_param.name: ^^^^postal_code
response_param.desc: Warehouse address postal code (also known as zip code).

response_param.name: ^^^^region_code
response_param.desc: Warehouse country or region code in two-character ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

response_param.name: ^^^^state
response_param.desc: Warehouse address state or province.

response_param.name: ^^^^district
response_param.desc: Warehouse address district or county.

response_param.name: ^^^^city
response_param.desc: Warehouse address city.

response_param.name: ^^^^address_line_1
response_param.desc: The detail address line 1.

response_param.name: ^^^^address_line_2
response_param.desc: The detail address line 2, additional address information(optional).

response_param.name: ^^^^address_line_3
response_param.desc: The detail address line 3, additional address information(optional).
